title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 8
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 8:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Arkin (Ed.) - Most Underappreciated; 50 Prominent Social Psychologists Describe Their Most Unloved Work (2011)

-  Belzen (Ed.)- Changing the Scientific Study of Religion Beyond Freud (2009)

-  Bloch et al (Eds.) - Psychiatry; Past, Present, and Prospect (2014)

-  Boag et al (Eds.) - Philosophy, Science, and Psychoanalysis; a Critical Meeting (2015)

-  Bowlby - Freudian Mythologies; Greek Tragedy and Modern Identities (2007)

-  Burstow et al (Eds.) - Psychology Disrupted; Theorizing Resistance and Crafting the (R)evolution (2014)

-  Carrette - Religion and Critical Psychology; the Ethics of Not-Knowing in the Knowledge Economy (2007)

-  Crews - Skeptical Engagements (2000)

-  Demorest - Psychology's Grand Theorists; How Personal Experiences Shaped Professional Ideas (2005)

-  Fayek - Future Psychoanalysis; Toward a Psychology of the Human Subject (2015)

-  Frankl - The Feeling of Meaninglessness; a Challenge to Psychotherapy and Philosophy (2010)

-  Izenberg -The Existentialist Critique of Freud; the Crisis of Autonomy (1976)

-  Jacobsen - Freud's Foes; Psychoanalysis, Science, and Resistance (2009)

-  Johnson - Unsafe at Any Dose; Exposing Psychiatric Dogmas - so Mind Can Heal (2006)

-  Kagan - Psychology's Ghosts; the Crisis in the Profession and the Way Back (2012)

-  Kearns (Ed.) - The Mirror Crack'd; When Good Enough Therapy Goes Wrong and Other Cautionary Tales for Humanistic Practitioners (2011)

-  Kristjansson - Virtues and Vices in Positive Psychology; a Philosophical Critique (2013)

-  Marom - Science, Psychoanalysis, and the Brain; Space for Dialogue (2015)

-  Muller - Doing Psychiatry Wrong; a Critical and Prescriptive Look at a Faltering Profession (2008)

-  Parker - Psychology After Deconstruction; Erasure and Social Reconstruction (2015)

-  Parker - Psychology After the Crisis; Scientific Paradigms and Political Debate (2015)

-  Parker - The Crisis in Modern Social Psychology and How to End it (1989)

-  Parker et al - Deconstructing Psychopathology (1995)

-  Pearl - A Question of Time; Freud in the Light of Heidegger's Temporality (2011)

-  Piers (Ed.) - Personality and Psychopathology; Critical Dialogues with David Shapiro (2011)

-  Rogers - Social Psychology; Experimental and Critical Approaches (2003)

-  Ruether - Many Forms of Madness; a Family's Struggle with Mental Illness and the Mental Health System (2010)

-  Sandler et al (Eds.) - Clinical and Observational Psychoanalytic Research; Roots of a Controversy (2000)

-  Silva et al - Psychiatric Pharmaceuticals as Emerging Contaminants in Wastewater (2015)

-  Steele (Ed.) - Psychoanalysis and the Unconscious and Fantasia of the Unconscious; the Works of D.H. Lawrence (2004)

-  Taylor - Hippocrates Cried; the Decline of American Psychiatry (2013)

-  Torrey - Out of the Shadows; Confronting America's Mental Illness Crisis (1997)

-  Whitaker & Cosgrove - Psychiatry Under the Influence; Institutional Corruption, Social Injury, and Prescriptions for Reform (2015)

-  Zachar et al (Eds.) - Alternative Perspectives on Psychiatric Validation; DSM, ICD, RDoC, and Beyond (2015)
